name: BlenderTools
description: Blender addons that improve the game development workflow between Blender and Unreal.

scripts.build-windows: rd /q /s dist 2>nul && vuepress build main && vuepress build send2ue && vuepress build ue2rigify && xcopy /E /I .\main\.vuepress\dist .\dist && xcopy /E /I .\ue2rigify\.vuepress\dist .\dist\ue2rigify && xcopy /E /I .\send2ue\.vuepress\dist .\dist\send2ue
scripts.build-linux: rm -f -r dist && vuepress build main && vuepress build send2ue && vuepress build ue2rigify && cp -r ./main/.vuepress/dist ./dist && cp -r ./ue2rigify/.vuepress/dist ./dist/ue2rigify && cp -r ./send2ue/.vuepress/dist ./dist/send2ue
